body:
Actually 393d61b does not seems to fix anything for me. Version is still set to 0.1.0 in atom menu

I don't if its related but an error at startup : 

```
>$ /usr/share/atom-shell/atom /usr/share/atom
[9412:0527/135046:INFO:gpu_info_collector_x11.cc(80)] NVCtrl extension does not exist.
App load time: 184ms
[9414:0100/000000:ERROR:zygote_linux.cc(532)] write: Broken pipe
```

And then a popup shows up :
![screenshot from 2014-05-27 13 51 36](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/25710/3090996/57ae4a9a-e595-11e3-9071-f3e76afab858.png)

---

Build info
- atom/atom-shell@v0.12.7
- atom/atom@00987f36
